#summary checking out IDIB code

IDIB projects can be checked out as one or individually

== All Projects ==

{{{
svn checkout http://idib.googlecode.com/svn/ idib
}}}

== IDIB Beacon ==

{{{
svn checkout http://idib.googlecode.com/svn/beacon/trunk beacon
}}}

== Flock OpenID ==

{{{
svn checkout http://idib.googlecode.com/svn/flock/trunk beacon
}}}

== Firefox OpenID ==

{{{
svn checkout http://idib.googlecode.com/svn/firefox/trunk beacon
}}}
